tags.name: Analytics
tags.description: Analytics service proxy API.

tags.name: App
tags.description: App represents information about apps available in the appstore.

tags.name: Credit Note
tags.description: A credit note is a document you send to your customer to correct a mistake on an order or an invoice, or to refund an amount paid for products or services.

tags.name: Credit Note Tag
tags.description: Credit Note resource tags management.

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: Customer represents an information related to company, or individual person.

tags.name: Customer Tag
tags.description: Customer resource tags management.

tags.name: Delivery Note
tags.description: Delivery notes.

tags.name: Email Account
tags.description: Email accounts that are available for sending/receiving emails in Xentral.

tags.name: Employee
tags.description: Employees

tags.name: External Reference
tags.description: External shop references that are linked to a product.

tags.name: External Reference Target
tags.description: All external shops that exists within Xentral

tags.name: Invoice
tags.description: An invoice is a commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer relating to a sale transaction and indicating the products, quantities, and agreed-upon prices for products or services the seller had provided the buyer.

tags.name: Invoice Tag
tags.description: Invoice resource tags management.

tags.name: License
tags.description: License and app subscription management

tags.name: Liability
tags.description: Returns a collection with all liabilities.

tags.name: Oauth
tags.description: Oauth tokens for external providers.

tags.name: Password Reset
tags.description: Password Reset represents an one-time access key to change the password of the connected User.

tags.name: Personal Access Token
tags.description: Personal access token which are used to authenticate against API v3.

tags.name: Product
tags.description: Product represents the services or things given company sells in the business.

tags.name: Product Category
tags.description: Product Category represents the Product Category Tree that can be used to categorise products.

tags.name: Product Import
tags.description: Management of various ways of importing products into the system.

tags.name: Product Tag
tags.description: Product resource tags management.

tags.name: Product Property
tags.description: Product properties describe its physical traits.

tags.name: Project
tags.description: Project resource.

tags.name: POS
tags.description: POS resource.

tags.name: Sales Price
tags.description: SalesPrices determine the prices used in sales to customers.

tags.name: Sales Order
tags.description: SalesOrders are an outbound orders, meaning that someone has bought from you.

tags.name: Setting
tags.description: Settings represents the application's configurations.

tags.name: Supplier
tags.description: Supplier represents an information related to providers of goods the company is managing.

tags.name: Supplier Tag
tags.description: Supplier resource tags management.

tags.name: Token
tags.description: Valid tokens grant access to API endpoints. You can exchange credentials in POST endpoint to create one.

tags.name: Ticket
tags.description: Tickets (currently only ticket /queues)

tags.name: UI Analytics
tags.description: Information about instance statistics and insights.

tags.name: UI Bookmark
tags.description: Bookmarks allow saving external resources for a quick access.

tags.name: UI Calendar
tags.description: Calendar hosts resources related to the events scheduled in the company.

tags.name: UI Query
tags.description: Collection of endpoints which return data for BI features in the front end.

tags.name: UI Search
tags.description: Search allows to look for information matching given query and interact with it.

tags.name: UI SystemMessage
tags.description: SystemMessage is an automated status check verifying correct behavior of one of the many modules.

tags.name: User
tags.description: User represents a Xentral account used to access other parts of the system.

tags.name: Warehouse
tags.description: Warehouse represents real items storage.

tags.name: Webhook
tags.description: Manage webhooks.

XentralToken.description: Bearer token obtained in POST /tokens endpoint or pregenerated in the system.

400.description: IETF RFC 7807 Problem API compliant response

violations.description: This field will be a mirrored request payload with only invalid fields and values replaced by error messages.

404.description: Resource was not found or not enough access privileges

415.description: Resource representation send in the request is not supported.
